question: You recently heard about an international company that you would like to work for. Write a job application letter and say:How did you hear about the company?What skills and qualification do you have?Why do you want to work there?
text: Hope you are doing well. I am Jen Aston and I am writing to you to apply for one of the jobs posted on your LinkedIn page recently. Let me explain to you in detail.

I have been following your organisation's updates for the last couple of years now, since the time I got to know that it is Foturne500 company in the Economic Times magazine. On 20th August, Ben Lopen, a Senior Manager working in your company  posted a few job vacancies in the Supply Chain and Operations department on your official LinkedIn page. One of the postings was for a Consultant position and I think I would be best fitted for this job. My education qualifications include a bachelor's degree in Engineering and MBA in Supply Chain. I have a total work experience of 3 years in Logistics across the Retail, Automotive and FMCG industries. While working, I have excelled in the skills like project management, data analysis and warehousing which I found are the basic requirements for the job posted.

The main reason I want to join your firm is that I have always been inspired by the kind of work your employees do. The solutions provided by you to your Clients and the efforts put by each and everyone in your firm are nothing but motivating.
I would, therefore, request you to kindly consider my application. I have attached my resume with this letter so that you can have a detailed look at it.
Looking forward to a positive response.
